During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each "Fated One of Miracles, Rezael" in your soul, and all of their [Divine Skill].[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two cards from your drop with different grades and a total grade less than or equal to the number of cards in your damage zone, and call them to (RC). Then, [COST][put a grade 3 or greater card with "Rezael" in its card name from hand into soul], choose a grade 3 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC). If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, all of the units called by this effect get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Blest Dragon, Gabwelius
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of the deck. If you put it on the bottom of the deck, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your damage zone has four or more cards, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +5000, if this unit was placed on (RC) by the ability of your vanguard with "Fated One" in its card name this turn and no drive checks were performed for the battle your rear-guard attacked this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], this unit gets [Power] +10000/drive -1 instead of [Power] +5000, and performs drive checks.

name: Destined King of Infinity, Levidras Empireo
effect: [CONT](VC):This unit is also regarded as "Destined One of Infinity, Levidras". During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each "Destined One of Infinity, Levidras" in your soul, and all of their [Divine Skill].[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 or put a card from hand into soul], choose two of any player's (RC), and put an Infinity Eyes marker on each of them. If you put a grade 3 or greater card with "Levidras" in its card name for this cost, choose three (RC) instead of two.[AUTO](VC):When any player's unit on a (RC) with your Infinity Eyes marker attacks or boosts, you may have that unit get [Power] +10000 or -10000 until end of that battle. If your opponent's unit got [Power] -10000, remove one of your Infinity Eyes markers from that (RC), and you draw a card.
